Macro - Stack
Macros
pushregs

push all registers (A,X,Y)

pullregs

pull all registers (A,X,Y)

push_ax

push A and X registers

pull_ax

pull A and X registers

push_ay

push A and Y registers

pull_ay

pull A and Y registers

push

push a value

Param
adr

address to get the value to push

pull

pull a value

Param
adr

address where to store the value pulled

phx

Push the X register

phy

Push the Y register

plx

Pull the X register

ply

Pull the Y register
